article: A man got off the bus and Sam, the bus driver, drove on. Soon the bus _ to the next stop. _ old man got on it. "This boy will give you his seat."Sam said to the old man. But the boy in the front seat did not move _ the old man went up to him, Sam looked at him. Then he said again to the old man in a _ voice,"This boy will be glad to give you his seat." This time the boy _ it. His face _ red. He got up at once. Then the old man sat down _ said to the boy, "Thank you, my boy."  "Most people want to be nice," Sam told the old man. "They just forget that. Sometimes they need a little _ . I am glad to give them such a push sometimes, too."
